title: 服务器登陆  internal server error
author: mixturebbq
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mixturebbq 于 2014-4-30 13:19 编辑 

请把错误报告反过来看
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.ThreadMinecraftServer.run(ThreadMinecraftServer.java:16)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:645)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:763)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:327)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:896)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServerListenThread.func_71747_b(DedicatedServerListenThread.java:33)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.ServerListenThread.func_71766_a(ServerListenThread.java:57)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.network.NetLoginHandler.func_72532_c(NetLoginHandler.java:80)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.network.NetLoginHandler.func_72529_d(NetLoginHandler.java:194)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at cpw.mods.fml.common.network.FMLNetworkHandler.onConnectionReceivedFromClient(FMLNetworkHandler.java:124)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at cpw.mods.fml.common.network.FMLNetworkHandler.handleClientConnection(FMLNetworkHandler.java:158)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at cpw.mods.fml.common.network.FMLNetworkHandler.handleVanillaLoginKick(FMLNetworkHandler.java:202)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.management.ServerConfigurationManager.attemptLogin(ServerConfigurationManager.java:485)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayerMP.<init>(EntityPlayerMP.java:200)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer.<init>(EntityPlayer.java:217)
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] INFO java.lang.NullPointerException
30.04 12:51:10 [Server] WARNING Failed to handle packet for aggioajg [/244.155.37.192:53592]: java.lang.NullPointerException

服务器之前一直正常运作,突然发生这个问题
mod,插件兼容性已经确认无误,mcpc.jar用的是之前mcbbs修复的版本

replies.author: xukarhei
replies.txt_content:
mixturebbq 发表于 2014-4-30 13:22
之前开了2,3个月都没问题,昨晚11点突然发生的
所有人存档备份一下删掉试试能不能进吧

replies.author: HotPe_e
replies.txt_content:
我也想求这个
是IP问题么？

replies.author: mixturebbq
replies.txt_content:
灬友情灬 发表于 2014-4-30 13:10
我也想求这个
是IP问题么？
可能是网速问题,但是不是
按照翻译是服务器内部问题

replies.author: xukarhei
replies.txt_content: 把aggioajg的存档删掉应该就ok了

replies.author: mixturebbq
replies.txt_content:
xukarhei 发表于 2014-4-30 13:12
把aggioajg的存档删掉应该就ok了
玩家存档...？
不是一个人的现象，是服务器玩家普遍出现这个问题

replies.author: xukarhei
replies.txt_content: 你先把仅作者可见关掉，然后看看出生点是不是弄错地方等等

replies.txt_content:
